metadata.title: CVE-2019-19450 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: paraparser in ReportLab before 3.5.31 allows remote code execution becausestart_unichar in paraparser.py evaluates untrusted user input in a unicharelement in a crafted XML document with '<unichar code="' followed byarbitrary Python code, a similar issue to CVE-2019-17626.

criterions.comment: python-reportlab package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
